Writer: Michael Wilson (screenplay), Rod Serling (screenplay), Pierre Boulle (novel)
Title: Planet of the Apes
Actors: Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter, Maurice Evans
Plot: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 1 nomination.
